H0.text: How many countries border the Sargasso Sea. 5 countries

H3.text: How many countries border the Sargasso Sea. None

A4.text: The Sargasso Sea Commission was established in 2014 by the governments of the Azores (Portugal), Bermuda (United Kingdom), Monaco, the United Kingdom and the United States.
